CLIENT: NATIONAL LOTTERY

CAMPAIGN: MILLIONAIRE RAFFLE

THE PROJECT

A campaign for National Lottery to highlight the Millionaire Raffle draw. This project featured both standard and rich creatives which were identical barring a real-time countdown clock. This was a really challenging project but I came out the other end with a wealth of new knowledge which is always encouraging. A Senior Developer was on hand to oversee this project and this helped immensely.
